clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in gastric cancer

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: OSI 7904L is a liposome encapsulated thymidylate synthase inhibitor which is indicated for use in advanced gastric and or gastroesophageal adenocarcinoma A G GEJA Current treatments also inhibit thymidylate synthase but the innovative lipid coating of OSI 7904L allows for more enduring results with administration of the TS inhibitor
